entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 12:00 AM AST Monday 30 January 2023

Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow beginning late this evening then changing to periods of rain overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 5 cm over the Highlands. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 late this evening then southwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 2.
